itunes:title: Mark Week 1 with Lauren Chandler
title: Mark Week 1 with Lauren Chandler
description:
Join us for a running start into the book of Mark as Raechel and Amanda study the first six chapters with Lauren Chandler, an author, worship leader, pastor’s wife, and mom of three. As they read this fast-paced Gospel, they share in the amazement and wonder we can experience as we see the authority of Jesus on display. From beginning to end, this episode reminds us that when we bring our deepest desires to Jesus, He makes us intimately aware of what our greatest need truly is—a need only satisfied in His life, death, and resurrection. 

Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 1 of the She Reads Truth Mark reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Mark Reading Plan collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/mark-week-1-with-lauren-chandler
